name: Piyush
post: Bengaluru, This Saturday gear up for the biggest club Hip-Hop night in the city with International DJ Maga! A super popular Dj from Russia, Maga ensures you groove to the finest of beats and awesome mixes throughout the night! So put on your dancing shoes, get your gang together and head out to an amazing 5-star nightclub!
